security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseapp.com wss://*.firebaseio.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.firebaseapp.com
